hero.subtitle: No technical skills needed. Deploy, manage, and grow your own Discourse forum in seconds.

modern.title: Modern Discussions
modern.desc: Unlike old forums, Discourse offers a modern, dynamic, and fluid discussion experience. Stay in the flow with infinite scrolling instead of getting lost in pages.

security.title: Security & Moderation
security.desc: Keep your community safe with automatic spam protection, trust system, and comprehensive moderation tools.

mobile.title: Mobile Friendly
mobile.desc: Responsive design that looks perfect on every device. Your members can join discussions even when on the go.

deep_dive_1.title: You Are In Control.
deep_dive_1.desc: Customize every detail of your community with a powerful admin panel.

deep_dive_2.title: Fully Customizable.
deep_dive_2.desc: Reflect your community's identity. Adjust everything from dark mode to custom color palettes to match your brand.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your community needs.

cta_section.title: Ready to Bring Your Idea to Life?
cta_section.desc: No trial period, no credit card required. Just start and build your community. First 14 days are on us.

footer.desc: The easiest Discourse hosting solution for modern communities. Leave the infrastructure to us, focus on your content.
